item.title: Updating qnods with a Fresh Look!
item.description: Today, I updated the layout of qnods, aiming for simplicity and minimalism. Despite a minor setback with Tailwind CSS, I learned and adapted, shaping qnods into a visually appealing, user-friendly space. Here’s to continuous improvement and the joy of tinkering!

item.title: Author
item.description: Hey there! ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to our cozy little corner of the internet! I’m Edward , the captain of this ship and the sole author behind everything you see here at qnods. Yep, it’s just me, navigating the vast sea of ideas and stories. But hey, who needs a crew when you’ve got passion and creativity, right? While I may be flying solo, I assure you, the journey is no less exciting.
